TopicTitle: Navigator x7-4 Low part count cargo SSTO (WIP)

Articles.Content:
This is the Navigator x7-4. It is a CPU friendly, low part count, Cargo SSTO. So far ive taken to Eve and Duna. I use it to carry a lander to its destination, decouple, land, rendezvous on return, and head home. While this isnt the hardest plane to fly, it isnt the easiest either.

Control Groups:

1-Turbo Jets

2-Nukes

3-Landing Gear

http://imgur.com/a/KW4F2#0

Craft Download:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/z8bx1vbznkt0yel/SSTO%20X7-4.craft?dl=0

Edited December 1, 2014 by brezzell
476 parts is hardly low count. Maybe for you, but I have a potato with 2 gigs of ram shared with the graphics card, and I can't even handle 150 too well. I love the craft though!
